oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis, characterization and structure of Ti(IV) complexes of hydroxy-rich ligands
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, PV
KOLEHMAINEN, E
RAO, CP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: reactivity
salicylaldehyde
derivatives
spectroscopy
products
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Coordination chemistry of two multi-hydroxy rich ligands has been explored with Ti(IV) by isolating the resultant products followed by their characterization. One of the products is also structurally characterized by single crystal XRD.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION A-INORGANIC BIO-INORGANIC PHYSICAL THEORETICAL & ANALYTICAL CHEMISTRY, 41(2), 284-289
